name: Alonk in the Donk
description:
Grab your pixels and escape with your life!

Alonk in the Donk is a very short, very janky Alone in the Dark ripoff that I made in about an hour. Enjoy the fruits of my "labor"

Use arrow keys to move, bump into things to interact with them.

Fun fact: I have never played an Alone in the Dark game.
